name: Beginner Strength Training
description: A program designed for beginners focusing on building foundational strength.

name: Intermediate Cardio Blast
description: An intermediate-level program aimed at improving cardiovascular health.

description: Focuses on muscle growth and strength increase, suitable for late beginners to intermediate trainees.
